name: Amanda the Thief 3: Royale Rescue
description:
NOTE! This is the third game of an original visual novel series I started at the end of 2020. The previous 2 games are available here, for free:

Amanda 1:https://gamejolt.com/games/Amandathiefgame/563794

Amanda 2:https://gamejolt.com/games/Amanda2thegame/607318

A misterious shadow killed King Emerick in his sleep.

It's up to Amanda- the pink-haired thief- and Leaf - a fairy of time and space - go back in time and save him from a demise He wasn't even meant to face.

But something go wrong and your heroes found themself 18 years in the past!

There, Amanda will found out more about her missing parents and the secrets of the Emerick family...

Join Amanda in this kinetic visual novel about time travel and destiny!
